name: PHP-OWA
short_description: PWP-OWA is a PHP-based drop-in replacement for Oracle's Apache/mod_plsql combination, or Oracle Internet Application Server (iAS), allowing for execution of PL/SQL Web Toolkit applications on any PHP-friendly Web server (Apache, IIS, iPlanet, etc.)
